Item ID4627

Bandit's brew is an alcoholic drink purchased at The Big Heist Lodge in the Kharidian Desert Bandit Camp for 650 coins. It cannot be made through brewing. In the Desert Treasure quest, players must purchase one before the bandits will talk about the Diamonds of Azzanadra.

Effects[edit | edit source]

  • Temporary skill boost to Thieving and Attack by 1
  • Heals 1 Hitpoints
  • Temporarily decreases Strength and Defence by ⌊ L e v e l × 6 100 ⌋ + 3 {\displaystyle \lfloor Level\times {\frac {6}{100}}\rfloor +3}
Level Decrease
1-19 3
20-39 4
40-59 5
60-79 6
80-99 7

[[File:Bandit's brew detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Bandit's brew''' is an [[alcohol]]ic [[drink]] purchased at [[The Big Heist Lodge]] in the [[Kharidian Desert Bandit Camp]] for {{NoCoins|650}} coins. It cannot be made through [[brewing]]. In the [[Desert Treasure]] [[quest]], players must purchase one before the [[Bandit (Bandit Camp)|bandit]]s will talk about the [[Diamonds of Azzanadra]].
==Effects==
* [[Temporary skill boost]] to [[Thieving]] and [[Attack]] by 1
* Heals 1 [[Hitpoints]]
* Temporarily decreases [[Strength]] and [[Defence]] by <math>\lfloor Level \times \frac{6}{100} \rfloor + 3</math>
